attributes.action: Allow weddings for 50% venue capacity like theatres and sports events.
attributes.additional_details:
Social distancing at weddings can be adhered to, depending on venue size with more than 15 people. 
We want the government to allow weddings at 50% venue capacity, while following social distancing measures as others in the entertainment and sports sector are allowed. 
People have put their weddings and celebrations on hold long enough. Why is a sporting event priority over these celebrations? 
Allow us 50% capacity so we can have our special day while remaining safe and sensible.
attributes.background: The government guidelines allow sporting events and theatres to host their events at 50% capacity along with social distancing measures in place. Yet weddings are still restricted to 15people, this includes the bride and groom. While funerals are restricted to 30 and 15 for a wake.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329339
